content: this is 100% on the Democrats. theyre not helping at all! the Trump administration obviously doesnt know what theyre doing, so someone’s gotta bail them out. but noooooo, its nothing but “he’s a rapist who was elected by wildly lying to everyone” and “lololol fuck Donald Trump.” where is the Patriotism? do you expect Congressional Republicans to actually do work? they were also elected on lies and racism! cmon Democrats! do your job and save the Republican Party!
